Title: Birdman or (The Unexpected Virtue of Ignorance)
Writer: Alejandro G. Iñárritu, Nicolás Giacobone, Alexander Dinelaris, Armando Bo, Raymond Carver (play)
Actors: Michael Keaton, Emma Stone, Kenny Chin, Jamahl Garrison-Lowe
Plot: A washed-up superhero actor attempts to revive his fading career by writing, directing, and starring in a Broadway production.
Production: New Regency Pictures, Le Grisbi, M Prods
